title: shrI rAm jayarAm
sahitya:
shrI rAm jayarAm jaya jaya rAm


anupallavi

  nArAyaNa Om namah shivAyavenum sAramAna nalla tAraka mantiram


caraNam    cancalattai keDuttu shAntattai koDuppadu anjalenrE enrum accam ozhippadu
kAmAdi arakkaraik-kaTTuDan azhippadu nEma niSTaiyuLLa nenjilE shezhippadu
Aramudinum inbam anbarukkAvadu nArada muni shonna jnAnat-tiru mantiram
